title: Google photos acting funny. Folders are all jumbled up, new camera photos missing
content:
I've tried searching in Recently added to find newly clicked photos from camera but couldn't locate them anywhere on the device. I could only find the last one clicked by opening camera app. Rest 5-6 clicked yesterday have been lost.
Google photos is my default photo app. 
Existing photos in Google photos somehow have moved across folders, there's no clear order. The whole app is a chaos. It clearly looks like as if something is broken but I can't figure out what. Tried force stop and restarting. 
Anyone else facing this problem with their Pixel?
